duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct face to face tax interviews and inspire confidence in clients.
Prepare complete and accurate tax returns.
Generate business growth, increase client retention, and offer additional products and services.
Support office priorities through teamwork and collaboration.

education_certification.credential: Successful completion of the H&R Block Income Tax Course², high school diploma or equivalent.
Must complete 3 hours of continuing education requirement and meet all other IRS and applicable state requirements
